languages.text: [Обратиться к сопровождающим] "Смутьяна — наказать, остальных — по отсекам. Аудиенция окончена".
[Address the chaperones] "Punish the troublemaker, put the rest back in their bays. This audience is over."
languages.original_text: [Обратиться к сопровождающим] "Смутьяна — наказать, остальных — по отсекам. Аудиенция окончена".

traits.locale_text: [Address the chaperones] "Spank the troublemaker, put the rest back in their cabins. This audience is over."
[Address the chaperones] "Spank the troublemaker, put the rest back in their cabins. This audience is over."
[Address the chaperones] "Punish the troublemaker, put the rest back in their bays. This audience is over."
[Address the chaperones] "Punish the troublemaker, put the rest back in their bays. This audience is over."
[Address the chaperones] "Punish the troublemaker, put the rest back in their bays. This audience is over."
[Address the chaperones] "Punish the troublemaker, put the rest back in their bays. This audience is over."

languages.text: [对陪护人员讲话] “给我狠狠地揍这个捣蛋鬼的屁股，让剩下的人回到他们的甲板上。这场会面结束了。”
languages.original_text: [Address the chaperones] "Punish the troublemaker, put the rest back in their bays. This audience is over."

traits.locale_text: [对陪护人员讲话] “给我狠狠地打这个捣蛋鬼的屁股，让剩下的人回到他们的船舱里。这场会面结束了。”

languages.text: [Dirigirte a los supervisores] «Que castiguen a ese entrometido y que el resto vuelva a sus bahías respectivas. Esta audiencia ha terminado».
languages.original_text: [Address the chaperones] "Punish the troublemaker, put the rest back in their bays. This audience is over."

traits.locale_text: [Dirigirte a los supervisores] «Que le den a ese entrometido unos azotes y que el resto vuelva a sus camarotes. Esta audiencia ha terminado».

languages.text: [付添人に指示する]「問題児は罰し、残りはベイに戻せ。この謁見は終わりだ」
languages.original_text: [Address the chaperones] "Punish the troublemaker, put the rest back in their bays. This audience is over."

traits.locale_text: [付添人に指示する]「問題児は罰し、残りはベイに戻せ。この謁見は終わりだ」

languages.text: [Die Aufsichtspersonen ansprechen] "Bestraft den Unruhestifter, die anderen zurück in ihre Module. Die Audienz ist beendet."
languages.original_text: [Address the chaperones] "Punish the troublemaker, put the rest back in their bays. This audience is over."

traits.locale_text: [Die Aufsichtspersonen ansprechen] "Hiebe für den Unruhestifter, die anderen zurück in ihre Kabinen! Die Audienz ist beendet."

languages.text: [Vous adresser aux accompagnateurs] « Châtiez le fauteur de troubles et renvoyez les autres dans leurs quartiers respectifs. L'audience est terminée. »
languages.original_text: [Address the chaperones] "Punish the troublemaker, put the rest back in their bays. This audience is over."

traits.locale_text: [Vous adresser aux accompagnateurs] « Fessez le fauteur de troubles et renvoyez les autres dans leurs cabines. L'audience est terminée. »

languages.text: [Refakatçilere hitap et] "Çıbanbaşını cezalandırın, kalanları da bölmelerine geri gönderin. Bu görüşme burada bitmiştir."
languages.original_text: [Address the chaperones] "Punish the troublemaker, put the rest back in their bays. This audience is over."

traits.locale_text: [Refakatçilere hitap et] "Çıbanbaşını cezalandırın, kalanları da bölmelerine geri gönderin. Bu görüşme burada bitmiştir."
